title: Spoon, "Signature Collection, "Picnic Flatware"", 1986
markings: Engraved in script on the handle: David Tisdale c. 1986
creditline: Museum purchase from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Flat rectangular handle of grey aluminum; brushed surface. Circular, concave bowl with flanged extension to overlap handle. Bowl affixed to handle with two silver rivets. Bowl anodized purple.

tombstone.epitaph: Spoon, "Signature Collection, "Picnic Flatware"", 1986.aluminum (anodized). Museum purchase from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1986-94-11.
